projects.title: Vazquez + Partners
projects.description: Brand identity and visual system for a luxury fashion consultancy. The project included logo design, typography, color palette, and brand guidelines to establish a sophisticated market presence.

projects.title: WØRKS
projects.description: Comprehensive branding for a New York-based creative studio focused on cultural advancement. The identity system reflects the studio's commitment to innovative design and strategic thinking.

projects.title: DoingWell
projects.description: Visual identity and digital presence for a health coaching practice. The project encompassed brand strategy, logo design, website design, and marketing materials to communicate wellness and personal transformation.
